#summary Get started on any PI API coding.

= Introduction =

Get started on any PI API coding.


= Details =
Anybody have problem using some of the MicroBlaze hardware component PIs, just log on to the following page, search the solution:
{{{
http://forums.xilinx.com/t5/Embedded-Solutions/ct-p/EMBED
}}}
or refer to the API document in this location:
{{{
file:///D:/Xilinx/12.1/ISE_DS/EDK/sw/XilinxProcessorIPLib/drivers/(x)/doc/html/api/
}}}
Where (x) is the PI unit name which you wanna get reference document.
Remember focus on API not hardware.
